#define OBD_INCOMPAT_LMM_VER   0x00000100

lmm_stripe_count has been shrunk from __u32 to __u16 and the remaining 16 bits are now used to store a generation.

Once we start changing the layout and bumping the generation, old versions expecting a 32-bit lmm_stripe_count will be confused by interpreting stripe_count | gen << 16 as the actual stripe count
